quote.quotepara: Sound like a ATI driver bug in 64 bits CPUs: http://lists.debian.org/debian-x/2004/05/msg00753.html http://lists.debian.org/debian-ia64/2006/05/msg00050.html http://lists.freedesktop.org/archives/xorg/2005-December/011524.html I don't know any patch for this, ATI cards are a unknown territory, all problems with this cards (to much!) I resolved changin it by other manufacturer, sory!

body.para: ATI and Linux. Horrible. It makes me even on i386/x86_64 cry out loud. Bought a new Core 2 Duo with ATI Sapphire and the rest is... Argh. Don't talk about it... 'Guess it's not any better with older ATI cards on Alpha.
